data.title: Terravita
data.meta_description: Terravita is an American producer duo who debuted on Monstercat with their remix of the song Just Like That by Pegboard Nerds, featuring Johnny Graves, which was released on January 20, 2016. January January 20, 2016: Terravita created a remix of the song Just Like That by Pegboard Nerds...
data.text:
Terravita is an American producer duo who debuted on Monstercat with their remix of the song Just Like That by Pegboard Nerds, featuring Johnny Graves, which was released on January 20, 2016.

Timeline[]

2016[]

January

January 20, 2016: Terravita created a remix of the song Just Like That by Pegboard Nerds, featuring Johnny Graves. The remix is featured on Pink Cloud (The Remixes).

Trivia[]

The group also has a second electronica band named Hot Pink Delorean.

Artists remixed[]

Pegboard Nerds (1)

Featured artists on artist's remixes[]

Johnny Graves (1)
